channel.title: Help please!
channel.description: I've been trying to host my server, but nobody can seem to connect. I feel it is due to the portfowarding I did, however I'm not sure what I did wrong. Would someone kindly assist me in this issue, if so feel free to pm me, reply here, or add me on msn: xhellgiverx@hotmail.com

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

K, first, you will need PortForward.com port checker to check if your ports are open. you can download it here. If it’s not open, specify what’s your router. I can help you on airport routers only. go to http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm and search your router in the list, they got a tut special for your router for sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @xhellgiverx xhellgiverx
item.description:
@xhellgiverx wrote:

I know it’s not too difficult and i have searched a tut on it, however I’m not sure what i’m doing wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Search a tutorial on port forwarding. People think it’s the harder part but it’s not. There’s thousand of tutorials on it.

Read full topic
